title: SCP-341-KO
content:
[[module CSS]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Poor+Story');
[[/module]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:start]]
**SCP-341-KO:** High as I Want and Beyond
**Author:** [[*user igangsu]]
**Translator:** [[*user fluxman]]
**Image Source:** [https://pixabay.com/ko/photos/%ED%99%94%EC%84%B1-%ED%96%89%EC%84%B1-%EB%B6%84%EC%9C%84%EA%B8%B0-%EB%B6%89%EC%9D%80-%ED%96%89%EC%84%B1-11608/?download #], [https://www.peakpx.com/119932/body-of-water-photo #]
----
= [http://scpko.wikidot.com/igangsu igangsu's author page]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[include :scpko:component:image-block name=http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/scp-341-ko/mars/medium.jpg|caption=Last known location of SCP-341-KO-A.]]
**Item #:** SCP-341-KO

**Object Class:** Keter

**Special Containment Procedure:** Adequate disinformation procedures should be done to hide SCP-341-KO's information from the public. People directly related to PoI-3410 should be treated with C-Class amnestics. SCP-341-KO-A is stored in a warehouse in Site-05K, checking regularly for oncoming messages. Attempts to track SCP-341-KO's current location are under progress.

**Description:** SCP-341-KO is a flying object that carries PoI-3410, made with an indoor heating tent and cardboard. Despite lacking vital features for interstellar survival, the object has flown in space, accelerating and decelerating through a trajectory, while also anomalously shielding the passenger from harmful environmental elements, such as extreme radiation, atmospheric pressure, and temperature. Gathered information suggests that SCP-341-KO is made by PoI-3410. However it is unknown as to how the object has obtained such anomalies. (See Addendum 1)

SCP-341-KO-A is a cell phone with its battery detached, crudely decorated with coloured papers and stickers. Despite its lack of power, it can recieve and send messages as normal, enabling limited communication with PoI-3410. The Foundation has succeeded in communication with PoI-3410 using SCP-341-KO-A, gathering information. (See Addendum 2)

The Foundation first became aware of SCP-341-KO after recieving multiple reports about a UFO flying over an elementary school in Korea. The Foundation tried to contain SCP-341-KO using uncrewed aircraft. However the attempt failed as the object rocketed out the atmosphere at high velocity. The Foundation was able to identify PoI-3410 while inspecing said said school, who was refusing attendence. 
----
**Addendum 341.1 Recovered Log**
Below are excerpts from a notebook found while searching PoI-3410's house.
[[=]]
[[div style="display: inline-block; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:90%; padding:10px; font-family: 'Poor Story'; font-size:16px;"]]
[[<]]
= [[size 140%]] **Flying Really Really Far** [[/size]]
//Make a big strong spaceship and see the planets in space!//

Things to prepare: Paper, glue(not the solid one), scissors, crayons, two of mom's old cell phones, blanket, pillow, snacks, drinks, water bottle, some notebooks and pens

**Plans:**
From the --veranda-- living room window in my house, fly to the school, show off my space ship, and fly to the moon and land there.

I stay one day at the moon, and fly to mars. Then I see the mountains and volcanoes, and go to Saturn to see Titan and check if it really looks like earth a long time ago. Then, I will fly to Pluto and cheer it up because it's not a planet anymore.

Then, I go to the planets I made! I named it after other stories. I coloured it in blue and purple! (And with yellow and highlight pens) I'm going to Aruna last because it's the prettiest,

**Keep in mind:** Don't go out the spaceship, dont' cry, **Don't be weak and return in the middle**

Home — School — Moon(One day) — Mars(5 Days) — Titan(3 Days) — Pluto(One day) — Darva(One week) — Menaka(One Month) — Aruna(One Month) — Home
[[/<]]
[[/div]]
[[/=]]

----
**Addendum 341.2 Communication Log**
Below are excerpts from the communication with PoI-3410 using SCP-341-KO-A.
[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
= **Communication Log 341-A**
**Foreword:** This is the initial communication between the Foundation and PoI-3410. The Foundation was able to contact her while testing the anomaly of SCP-341-KO. The Foundation's messages are highlighted in blue. 
----
> I just reached the Olympus Mountain!

> The ship is climbing up it's cool

> ##blue|Anyone there?##

> Um, who is this...? This is my mom's phone.

> ##blue|Hi, This is the rocket team. We've heard someone travelling through space.##

> Wow

> Really?

>

> ##blue|How did you get to space?##

> I don't know.

> It just started flying after I got prepared

> Ive never done this before

> ##blue|We're looking for ways to get you back here.##

> Don't do that!!

> Dad will know I'm in trouble

> I'm gonna get back after a short trip

> That's my plan

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
= **Communication Log 341-B**
> Hey

> Do you have something like ointment? Like medicine

> ##blue|We have several here. Could you recieve it?##

> No...

> I ran out of drinks

> I was saving it.

> ##blue|What do you need the ointment for? Are you hurt?##

> No

> I need to put it on my calf every night

> I forgot to take it with me

> He said the red thing goes away faster if i do that

> ##blue|Red thing?##

> Dad said not to go to school before it goes away.

> It doesnt hurt if i dont touch it

> He said people will bully me if i go there like this
----
**Notes:** The Foundation provided her with simple survival methods useful in the environment.
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
= **Communication Log 341-C**

> It was dark and now it's bright again. It's cold.
[[include :scpko:component:image-block name=http://scpko.wdfiles.com/local--resized-images/scp-341-ko/sea/medium.jpg|caption=Attached Image.|width=300px]]
> I don't know where I am

> Are you there?

> ##blue|Just saw it.##

> ##blue|Is that outside the tent?##

> I'm cold

> I want to see mommy

> ##blue|We could call her if you want.##

> She's on vacation. She can't see me

> She comes once a month, and takes me out to dinner

> It's cold, so I'll tuck in well.

> ##blue|How much food do you have?##

> I have some cookies

> I can't eat it though

> I should have brought some other stuff too

> I ran out of drinks so I'm drinking water

> I have nothing to do so I keep sleeping
[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div style="display: inline-block; border-radius: 10px; border:dashed 1px #444444; background:#F5F5F5; float:top; width:96.5%; padding:10px"]]
= **Communication Log 341-D**
> I can't call here

> I have my phone charger but I can't charge it

> I ate the cookies but I'm still hungry

> ##blue|Can you tell me what is happening in the tent?##

> I made a cave with my blanket I'm texting there

> too cld

> little snacks and water

> ##blue|Anything you could check for your location in the sky?##

> There's thunder everywhere I'm scared

> I'm not opening the tent

> ##blue|It seems you're going to Darva according to your plans. You might be there.##

> I don't know

> I don't know

> I'm sleepy
[[/div]]
----
[[module listPages order="updated_at desc" limit="1"]]
**Addendum 341.3 Additional Recovery Log**
At %%updated_at|%Y %m %e%%, communication was cut. Below are the final messages recieved on SCP-341-KO-A
[[/module]]
> cold

> no battery getting dark
author: fluxman
